person.persName: Philip Wadley (Caldwell County, Kentucky, laborer; Livingston Co farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Robin Wadley and Comfort Wadley. Married to Sarah J. Gunter Wadley in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on July 18, 1865. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Laborer in Livingston County in 1860. Signed a petition as a Caldwell County resident in 1861.
